messages.message: Found it interesting that adding an extra space changes the reply.
wonder if its because the model associates correct sentence structure and punctuation with formality versus incorrect spacing and structure with informality :sweat_smile:

Yeah, we have seen high prompt sensitivity with LLMs. We have worked on prompt abstraction a bit with high priority use cases like table extraction. We will look into generalising that in future.

@Hari @Rakesh
